title: Vista SnapSHOT.zip
description:
This is a Vista screenshot collection from my PC, for those who have never installed, used or seen the real vista ever. And also for those people who like modified Windows XP rather than a real Vista. They should know how beautiful the real VISTA is.

Check out this tiny collection containing 37 screenshot from my PC loaded with Windows Vista Ultimate. 

A tips for people who have wish to use Vista, but there PC is not good enough to Run Windows Vista Ultimate. If you meet the minimum requirements for Vista like 2.80GHz processor + 512MB RAM + 256MB AGP + 40GB HDD + DVD ROM, my suggestion for those to use &#039;Windows Vista HomeBasic&#039;. Visually, Vista Ultimate is differ from the Vista HomeBasic in only the &#039;Vista Aero&#039; feature. &#039;Aero&#039; is a feature that gives the extra-ordinary look with the transparency as shown in this screenshot collection. Other exceptions are not that remarkable.

So my friends, try Windows Vista according to your PC cofiguration.

After using Vista once on my PC, now XP seems very poor to me in sence of features and looks.


Have fun.
All the best.



================================================================
For feedback:

Rehan
Xtrio Corporation
